meta.title: The Shattered Crown of Elarion
meta.notes: LOTR-inspired epic. Classic hopeful tone, lyrical narration with verses in plain text. Familiar places and figures as references. Abilities 0–30 (sum 120), skill thresholds 10/20/25. Shadow corruption meter with multiple endings.

rules.check: total = d20 + floor(ability/5); success if total >= dc
rules.win_condition: Reach a positive ending with all abilities > 0

scenes.title: Shard Beneath the Hill
scenes.description: In a rabbit-scratched hollow you find a thin crescent of silver that glows as if remembering dawn. Elaria later sings: 'Bright was the brow of Elarion's crown, star-set and sorrow-spun.'
scenes.background: Green hills breathe bread-warm air; larks stitch sunlight into the morning as hedgerows whisper of older days. Ale and pipe-smoke mingle with apple blossom; laughter carries over low fences.

choices.option: Show the shard to your kindly neighbor

success.narration: They gasp and press a meat pie on you 'for the road'. Hope tastes like gravy.

failure.narration: They tut about old junk; you keep your wonder quiet.

choices.option: Hide it and study it by lamplight (Lore)

success.narration: You trace faint runes: 'Elen... arion...'

failure.narration: Your notes smudge; the glow persists anyway.

scenes.title: Road to Bree
scenes.description: You set out with a small pack, the shard wrapped in cloth. The Greenway smells of rain and horses.
scenes.background: Green hills breathe bread-warm air; larks stitch sunlight into the morning as hedgerows whisper of older days. Ale and pipe-smoke mingle with apple blossom; laughter carries over low fences.

choices.option: Walk light-foot with cheerful song

success.narration: A cart-driver smiles and offers a ride.

failure.narration: Your tune goes thin; you hum anyway.

choices.option: Keep a weather-eye for trouble

success.narration: You spot muddy prints and give them wide berth.

failure.narration: You miss a turning and circle back, wiser.

scenes.title: The Prancing Pony
scenes.description: At Bree, buttered light spills from The Prancing Pony. Thalen the Ranger watches from the corner; Durin’s Kin boasts of a pickaxe that splits boulders like bread.
scenes.background: Green hills breathe bread-warm air; larks stitch sunlight into the morning as hedgerows whisper of older days. Ale and pipe-smoke mingle with apple blossom; laughter carries over low fences.

choices.option: Introduce yourself plainly

success.narration: Thalen nods; trust begins with simple words.

failure.narration: Thalen arches a brow; patience yet.

choices.option: Share the shard’s glow under the table

success.narration: Elaria’s eyes widen; Maedren murmurs of old songs.

failure.narration: A patron squints; you snuff the light.

scenes.title: Company of Chance
scenes.description: By firelight you speak of roads east. Maedren the Grey recites softly: 'Roads are made by feet and deeds; stars are found by hearts that heed.'
scenes.background: Green hills breathe bread-warm air; larks stitch sunlight into the morning as hedgerows whisper of older days. Ale and pipe-smoke mingle with apple blossom; laughter carries over low fences.

choices.option: Plead for guidance from Maedren

success.narration: He smiles: 'We go together then.'

failure.narration: He strokes his beard: 'We shall see.'

choices.option: Map a cautious route to Rivendell

success.narration: Thalen approves the prudent marks.

failure.narration: You redraw twice; better now than later.

scenes.title: Watch on the Greenway
scenes.description: Under a hedgerow, you share bread and speak of old kings while stars kindle.
scenes.background: Green hills breathe bread-warm air; larks stitch sunlight into the morning as hedgerows whisper of older days. Ale and pipe-smoke mingle with apple blossom; laughter carries over low fences.

choices.option: Stand first watch with Thalen

success.narration: You hear foxes and far water; no harm comes.

failure.narration: Sleep tugs your eyes; Thalen covers with a nod.

choices.option: Tell a small joke to hearten the camp

success.narration: Even Durin’s Kin snorts into his beard.

failure.narration: Your timing stumbles; Elaria's smile steadies you.

scenes.title: Old Troll Road
scenes.description: By a toppled stone, bones lie cracked. A smell of damp leather and old anger lingers.
scenes.background: Green hills breathe bread-warm air; larks stitch sunlight into the morning as hedgerows whisper of older days. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Sneak past the lair (Stealth)

success.narration: You pass like dew that never fell.

failure.narration: A pebble skitters; the dark grumbles, but sleeps.

choices.option: Set a simple warding charm from Maedren’s kit

success.narration: Lantern-light feels braver; shadows step back.

failure.narration: The charm flickers; your courage holds steady.

scenes.title: Weary Bridge at Twilight
scenes.description: A cracked bridge crosses a brown river. Elaria sings a walking verse about stones that remember gentle feet.
scenes.background: Green hills breathe bread-warm air; larks stitch sunlight into the morning as hedgerows whisper of older days. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Test each flagstone methodically

success.narration: You mark safe stones with chalk.

failure.narration: Your foot dips; Durin’s Kin hauls you back.

choices.option: Leap the wider gaps with a laugh

success.narration: Your light step heartens the others.

failure.narration: A scrape kisses your knee; onward still.

scenes.title: Turning East
scenes.description: At a crossroads cairn, Thalen points toward the Last Homely House. 'If Elrond cannot help, none can.'
scenes.background: Green hills breathe bread-warm air; larks stitch sunlight into the morning as hedgerows whisper of older days. Harp strings seem to hang in the air; starlight feels close enough to touch.

choices.option: Agree and cheer the pace

success.narration: Spirits lift; feet find a lighter rhythm.

failure.narration: Weariness yawns, but hope keeps time.

choices.option: Study the cairn’s carvings (Lore)

success.narration: Old Tengwar names: 'Beren... Lúthien...' Courage rises like a blush.

failure.narration: Dust hides a line; you catch enough.

scenes.title: Rivendell’s Falling Water
scenes.description: Rivendell opens like a secret kept kindly. Harps speak softly as rivers do.
scenes.background: Green hills breathe bread-warm air; larks stitch sunlight into the morning as hedgerows whisper of older days. Harp strings seem to hang in the air; starlight feels close enough to touch.

choices.option: Request counsel from Elrond’s folk

success.narration: Warm bread, wiser words; rest for sore feet.

failure.narration: A courteous bow returns a courteous wait.

choices.option: Study the shard with elven lorekeepers (Lore)

success.narration: You learn of Elarion’s crown, shattered in sorrow, seeking those who choose hope.

failure.narration: You lose yourself in marginalia; still useful.

scenes.title: Counsel beneath Carven Beams
scenes.description: Banners drift with painted histories. Maedren recites: 'Not all bright things are brittle; some bend like branches and endure.'
scenes.background: Green hills breathe bread-warm air; larks stitch sunlight into the morning as hedgerows whisper of older days. Harp strings seem to hang in the air; starlight feels close enough to touch.

choices.option: Pledge to carry the shard toward Lothlórien

success.narration: Elvish eyes shine; blessings travel with you.

failure.narration: A hush falls; your vow still stands.

choices.option: Ask for more swords and gear

success.narration: Durin’s Kin claps your shoulder; packs grow sensible.

failure.narration: You get what you need, not what you want.

scenes.title: Ruins of Eregion
scenes.description: Broken forges sleep under nettles. Rings are only stories here—mostly.
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Pick through the forges for clues

success.narration: You find a stamping of the crown’s star-mark.

failure.narration: Scraps only; a tale half-told.

choices.option: Keep watch while others search

success.narration: You spot a pale wolf and it chooses another path.

failure.narration: Wind plays tricks; no harm done.

scenes.title: Wind of Hollin
scenes.description: Grass bows in long waves. Elaria hums: 'Go light, go true; where stars were strewn, we follow you.'
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Set a steady marching rhythm

success.narration: Boots and hearts keep time together.

failure.narration: A blister complains; spirits do not.

choices.option: Scout ahead for safer ground

success.narration: You find a deer track that kisses dry stone.

failure.narration: A bramble snags your sleeve; a reminder to slow.

scenes.title: West-gate of Moria
scenes.description: Moon-letters bloom on stone. The door waits for the right word like a riddle with ears.
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths. Stone smells of iron and memory; far hammers dream under the earth.

choices.option: Recall the tale of 'friend' (Lore)

success.narration: Elaria smiles; 'Mellon.' The doors sigh aside.

failure.narration: The word sticks; Maedren coughs and tries again.

choices.option: Brace the door with dwarven craft

success.narration: Stone respects strength spoken kindly.

failure.narration: Your shoulders complain; the door yields late.

scenes.title: Halls Under the Mountain
scenes.description: Pillars like forest trunks; quiet like a held breath. Your lamp writes small suns on the floor.
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths. Stone smells of iron and memory; far hammers dream under the earth.

choices.option: Mark the path with chalk and string

success.narration: Your trail sings a soft line through the dark.

failure.narration: Twine catches; Elaria frees it with a smile.

choices.option: Carry more load to spare your friends

success.narration: Weight teaches you patience; others walk easier.

failure.narration: Your back protests; pride keeps pace.

scenes.title: Bridge of Echoes
scenes.description: Across a narrow span, your footfalls return like other feet not here.
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths. Stone smells of iron and memory; far hammers dream under the earth.

choices.option: Creep low and slow (Stealth)

success.narration: Even echoes whisper approval.

failure.narration: A buckle chimes; rocks answer.

choices.option: Speak a blessing against falling

success.narration: A quiet courage tucks under your ribs.

failure.narration: The prayer stumbles; you cross anyway.

scenes.title: Doom, Doom (Far Drums)
scenes.description: Somewhere, drums begin. Durin’s Kin grins tightly. 'Best get moving.'
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths. Stone smells of iron and memory; far hammers dream under the earth.

choices.option: Set a brisk, orderly retreat

success.narration: No panic; only purpose.

failure.narration: A stumble costs a moment; you keep form.

choices.option: Bear down and carry who needs it

success.narration: You shoulder weight that would shame a pony.

failure.narration: Breath rasps; heart burns bright.

scenes.title: Dimrill Dale: Breath of Day
scenes.description: Daylight breaks like bread shared among friends. Elaria sings of sunlight on helm and hair.
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths.

choices.option: Let laughter return, a little

success.narration: Shadows shrink when joy remembers itself.

failure.narration: A tired chuckle warms the air.

choices.option: Scan the dale for danger

success.narration: You notice safe hollows and a deer path east.

failure.narration: A hawk’s cry startles you into a smile.

scenes.title: Edge of Lothlórien
scenes.description: Golden leaves hold their own sunlight. Time seems to speak more slowly here.
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths. Harp strings seem to hang in the air; starlight feels close enough to touch.

choices.option: Ask leave to enter and rest

success.narration: Voices like clear water answer welcome.

failure.narration: Protocol tangles; patience unties it.

choices.option: Walk softly and match your breath to the trees

success.narration: Your heartbeat learns a gentler drum.

failure.narration: Feet remember stones; leaves forgive them.

scenes.title: Glade of the Galadhrim
scenes.description: In a high flet, song falls like rain. A simple verse drifts: 'We mend what breaks with golden thread; we keep what’s kind and fair.'
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths. Harp strings seem to hang in the air; starlight feels close enough to touch.

choices.option: Share your small walking song

success.narration: Elves smile; harmony finds you.

failure.narration: Your voice wobbles; courage steadies it.

choices.option: Meditate with Elaria beneath the mallorn

success.narration: The shard warms in your palm, like a bird learning trust.

failure.narration: Thoughts rustle; peace lands anyway.

scenes.title: Gifts and Guiding Light
scenes.description: You receive cloaks, lembas, and a phial of captured starlight. A whisper of Galadriel’s name moves like wind through leaves.
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths. Harp strings seem to hang in the air; starlight feels close enough to touch.

choices.option: Thank your hosts with humble heart

success.narration: Gratitude sweetens even hard bread.

failure.narration: Words feel small; truth does not.

choices.option: Ask after tales of Elarion’s crown (Lore)

success.narration: Legends speak of Dorthonion’s ruins holding the last bright piece.

failure.narration: An old tale lacks a last verse; your road will write it.

scenes.title: Down the Anduin
scenes.description: Boats nose the current. Oars whisper; swans make smaller rivers on the larger one.
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths.

choices.option: Keep a steady stroke and song

success.narration: The river accepts you as kin.

failure.narration: An eddy spins you once; laughter returns.

choices.option: Study the banks for a hidden mooring

success.narration: You spot a willow that points to a safe cove.

failure.narration: You choose a decent landing nonetheless.

scenes.title: Forking of Paths
scenes.description: To the east, lands grow harsh; to the north, ruins brood under pines. The shard warms faintly toward the north.
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Follow the shard’s pull to the north

success.narration: Trust becomes compass; compass becomes road.

failure.narration: Doubt pricks; you still turn north.

choices.option: Skirt east to avoid orc-patrolled woods

success.narration: Prudence walks beside you like an old friend.

failure.narration: You save strength; time will judge you kindly.

scenes.title: Plain of Rohan
scenes.description: Wind combs the tall grass. You dream of horses like arrows of sunlight.
scenes.background: Old roads remember boot and hoof; barrows and broken watchtowers brood over windy heaths.

choices.option: Keep low and make speed

success.narration: Cloud-shadows race you and lose.

failure.narration: A gopher hole swears at your ankle.

choices.option: Forage wisely and rest well

success.narration: Lembas and roots, a feast to tired feet.

failure.narration: You misjudge a thistle; laughter mends it.

scenes.title: Border of Dorthonion
scenes.description: Pines hold shadows like breath. Old banners fray to threads. The shard hums low.
scenes.background: Moon-silver glows on leaves; rivers speak in twilight tongues and stone halls echo with unspent songs. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Light a small lantern and cover it well

success.narration: Enough to comfort, not to call.

failure.narration: Moths dance; courage keeps them company.

choices.option: Move like a leaf in wind (Stealth)

success.narration: Owls ignore you as kin.

failure.narration: A twig snaps; only the stars hear.

scenes.title: Ridge of the Watcher
scenes.description: A shadow crouches on a far tor. Elaria whispers: 'Not all eyes sleep.'
scenes.background: Moon-silver glows on leaves; rivers speak in twilight tongues and stone halls echo with unspent songs. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Observe patiently until the wind turns

success.narration: You see the watcher tire and shift away.

failure.narration: Cold creeps in; resolve warms fingers.

choices.option: Feign a fox call to cover your move

success.narration: A clever sound; even Durin’s Kin smirks.

failure.narration: It comes out like a coughing duck. Still works.

scenes.title: Gate of Fallen Kings
scenes.description: Two kneeling statues hold a broken lintel. The shard hums louder, eager as a hound.
scenes.background: Moon-silver glows on leaves; rivers speak in twilight tongues and stone halls echo with unspent songs. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Lift the fallen stones with care

success.narration: Muscle and mercy together move mountains.

failure.narration: Stone scrapes; you hold steady anyway.

choices.option: Find the hidden release carved with leaves (Lore)

success.narration: Your fingers find a fern rune that sighs open.

failure.narration: The rune hides; you pry with a knife in the end.

scenes.title: Hollow Court of Elarion
scenes.description: A courtyard like a cupped hand. In its palm, a dais. In its heart, a song almost heard: 'Star of the West, bright against night...'
scenes.background: Moon-silver glows on leaves; rivers speak in twilight tongues and stone halls echo with unspent songs. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Answer the song with a line of your own

success.narration: Your voice makes a bridge the wind can cross.

failure.narration: Shy words still count; doors care for courage.

choices.option: Hold the shard aloft and breathe

success.narration: Light peels from silver like dawn from mountains.

failure.narration: It flickers; your will stays true.

scenes.title: Vault of Whispers
scenes.description: Stone remembers voices. One speaks: 'Will you bear light for others, little one?' Another: 'Or will you keep it for yourself?'
scenes.background: Moon-silver glows on leaves; rivers speak in twilight tongues and stone halls echo with unspent songs. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Swear to bear for others

success.narration: Warmth answers like bread fresh from oven.

failure.narration: Silence tests you; you pass by standing still.

choices.option: Claim you will keep it safe alone

success.narration: The vault chills; the shard grows brighter in your fist.

failure.narration: Your voice echoes with iron edges.

scenes.title: Echo of a Fallen Maia
scenes.description: A figure of ash and star-fragments uncoils from the dark. 'Power is mercy properly spent,' it purrs.
scenes.background: Moon-silver glows on leaves; rivers speak in twilight tongues and stone halls echo with unspent songs. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Answer with pity, not anger

success.narration: Its edges blur; it almost remembers kindness.

failure.narration: You keep your temper and your way.

choices.option: Stand unyielding and dare it nearer

success.narration: It recoils at the strength that serves love.

failure.narration: It presses close; your friends step in.

scenes.title: Chamber of the Crown
scenes.description: On a table of black glass lies the circlet, broken: a half-crown and three bright shards.
scenes.background: Moon-silver glows on leaves; rivers speak in twilight tongues and stone halls echo with unspent songs. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Place your shard among its kin

success.narration: Light threads silver to silver; a low chord fills the room.

failure.narration: You fumble; Elaria steadies your hands.

choices.option: Examine the setting for a safer bind (Engineering)

success.narration: You brace tiny clasps; craft courts wonder.

failure.narration: Clasp bites your thumb; the work holds.

scenes.title: When the Crown Breathes
scenes.description: Silver brightens the dark. Verse rises of its own accord: 'O star of hope, return and stay; make night forget its teeth.'
scenes.background: Moon-silver glows on leaves; rivers speak in twilight tongues and stone halls echo with unspent songs. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Humble yourself before the light

success.narration: You feel smaller and somehow more true.

failure.narration: You bow too fast; the light forgives.

choices.option: Reach for its strength to keep

success.narration: The light answers your will like a hound eager to please.

failure.narration: It strains your bones; you do not let go.

scenes.title: Storm from the East
scenes.description: Over the pines, a stain of ash-laden cloud gathers. Orc horns bark like sick laughter.
scenes.background: Moon-silver glows on leaves; rivers speak in twilight tongues and stone halls echo with unspent songs. Ash rides the breeze; even silence looks westward.

choices.option: Lead the company to higher ground

success.narration: Your voice is a rope everyone can hold.

failure.narration: Feet slide; hearts grip.

choices.option: Scout a hidden goat-track

success.narration: You find a path thin as a blade and twice as useful.

failure.narration: A slip scars your palm; lesson learned.

scenes.title: Path of the Fir-trees
scenes.description: Snow-dust frets the needles. You can see far: west to hope, east to hunger.
scenes.background: Mountains hold their breath; the East smolders low and far, like a thought no one wants to think. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Share lembas and a joke

success.narration: Warmth returns to tired faces.

failure.narration: Even a weak joke is a roof against rain.

choices.option: Walk the line with quiet vigilance

success.narration: You catch a glint of helms below and plan accordingly.

failure.narration: The cold nips; patience bites back.

scenes.title: The Last Watch before Dawn
scenes.description: Maedren murmurs: 'Courage is not the loud thing. It is tea shared when swords are close.'
scenes.background: Mountains hold their breath; the East smolders low and far, like a thought no one wants to think.

choices.option: Keep companions close and calm

success.narration: Breath syncs; fear goes somewhere else for a while.

failure.narration: A shiver passes through; you bring it to heel.

choices.option: Sharpen blades and spirit together

success.narration: Steel sings low; so do hearts.

failure.narration: A nick bites your thumb; you smile anyway.

scenes.title: Threshold of Choice
scenes.description: The Crown, mended but not whole, lies in your hands. Three paths open like doors made of song.
scenes.background: Mountains hold their breath; the East smolders low and far, like a thought no one wants to think. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Reforge fully and return it to the West (Light)

success.narration: You will not keep what was meant to be shared.

failure.narration: Your resolve stumbles, then stands taller.

choices.option: Break it to deny it to all (Withstand)

success.narration: Hard wisdom denies temptation a throne.

failure.narration: Your hands shake and then are still.

choices.option: Claim the Crown’s light for yourself (Shadow)

success.narration: Power roots in you like a winter sun.

failure.narration: The light argues; your will wins for now.

scenes.title: Song at the Edge of the World
scenes.description: A final verse gathers unbidden: 'Give back the light, and it will grow; break what tempts, and night will go; keep it close, and shadows know.'
scenes.background: Mountains hold their breath; the East smolders low and far, like a thought no one wants to think.

choices.option: Speak hope and friendship

success.narration: Your words become a bridge others cross gladly.

failure.narration: Your words falter; hearts still listen.

choices.option: Speak hard truth and sacrifice

success.narration: Wisdom walks with sorrow; both bow to courage.

failure.narration: Even in sacrifice you find a gentler path.

choices.option: Speak dominion and solitary will

success.narration: Silence kneels; stars avert their eyes.

failure.narration: Some lights refuse to kneel; they wait.

scenes.title: Ending: The Light Restored
scenes.description: At Rivendell, Elrond smiles sadly as white gulls cry far away. The Crown’s light rides West on a swan-ship. Elaria sings a glad song of home and harvest.
scenes.background: Mountains hold their breath; the East smolders low and far, like a thought no one wants to think. Harp strings seem to hang in the air; starlight feels close enough to touch.

choices.option: Walk the gardens with your friends

success.narration: Leaves applaud soft as hands at a hearth.

failure.narration: Peace holds like a well-mended cloak.

scenes.title: Ending: The Shadow Withstood
scenes.description: On a high tor, you break the Crown. Its light leaps like a freed bird and is gone. 'Some gifts are to be refused,' Maedren says, eyes bright with tears.
scenes.background: Mountains hold their breath; the East smolders low and far, like a thought no one wants to think. Thistles grip fallen banners; the wind knows old names.

choices.option: Sit quietly until stars rise

success.narration: Grief and pride learn each other’s names.

failure.narration: You listen to the wind finish its thought.

scenes.title: Ending: The Shadow Claimed
scenes.description: You wear the light and the light wears you; friends become counsels, counsels become chains. The East grows quiet when you look its way.
scenes.background: Mountains hold their breath; the East smolders low and far, like a thought no one wants to think. Ash rides the breeze; even silence looks westward.

choices.option: Stand alone on the ridge

success.narration: Victory tastes like iron. Winter watches.

scenes.title: Coda: The Grey Havens
scenes.description: At the Havens, white ships breathe like sleeping whales. You choose shore and seasons, tea and tilled earth, letters and long walks. Songs remember you kindly.
scenes.background: Mountains hold their breath; the East smolders low and far, like a thought no one wants to think.

choices.option: Return home the long way, with many stories

success.narration: The road keeps a space for your footsteps.
